name: Daddy's Girls
description:
The responsibility towards his little girls was what made Ryan be on track all those years. Alice and Emma were all he had and he has yet to understand that they also were all he ever needed. After passing the age of 30 having two pretty girls walking half naked through the hour was just too much for Ryan to bear..

While looking pretty much the same, girls have been significantly different on the inside. Alice, whose cheerful but responsible attitude was greatly appreciated wherever she went, was on the school council and was considered as the more intelligent of the two. Emma on the other hand was way more extravert than her sister and had been voted twice as the most popular girl of the entire school..

Could a man desire anything else while having such gems within toughing distance?..Features:
  • captivating storyline
  • alluring characters
  • tantalizing artwork
  • pleasant soundtrack
  • Steam achievements
